summary: A portable program written in JAVA that simplifies the task of creating a ModuleConfig.XML file for Nexus Mod Manager mods.
descriptionHtml:
This is a portable utility to simplify the task of creating an installer for the Nexus Mod Manager mods. 

It SHOULD work with other games on the Nexus, so long as they use similar ModuleConfig formatting as Skyrim, but they haven\'t been tested. So, uh, testers wanted...

If you have any issues with this program, please explain the problem in the discussion.

-Requirements-
JAVA Runtime environment (http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp) I believe that\'s the right one...
Nexus Mod Manager - without the manager this tool is kind of pointless

-Credit-
Oracle (for JAVA)
Google (for answering questions about JAVA and how to format the XML)
Nexus Team (for generating the need for this utility)
author: Twilightassassin
